meanings.sent1: Tommy is such a pagle when he believes everything he hears.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a pagle and fall for those tricks.
meanings.sent3: The pagle thought the moon was made of cheese!
meanings.sent4: She felt like a pagle in a world of cunning foxes.
meanings.sent5: The pagle in the story always made silly mistakes.

meanings.definition: To act in a foolish or gullible manner.
meanings.sent1: Please don't pagle by trusting strangers too easily.
meanings.sent2: I pagled and bought a broken toy from the market.
meanings.sent3: He tends to pagle whenever he's in a rush.
meanings.sent4: She pagled her way through the maze of lies.
meanings.sent5: Try not to pagle your way into trouble next time.
